fields.name: access_control.room
fields.tip: Select ..Level.. to change access for the entire controller

fields.name: access_control.state
fields.prompt: Set the state for this [% noun %]

fields.name: access_control.user_groups
fields.fhelp:
Select from the Denied list to inlcude the users/groups in the [% key_attr %] [% noun %]'s acl and then click add (+).

OR

Select from the Allowed list to exclude the users/groups from the [% key_attr %] [% noun %]'s acl and then click remove (-).

fields.name: backup.next_level
fields.tip: Sequence; complete 0, weekly 1, daily 3 2 5 4 7 6 9 8 9 9 ...

fields.name: backup.operation
fields.tip: Do you want to leave the tape position where it is or do you want to rewind the tape before the dump begins ?

fields.name: backup.pathsTar
fields.tip: Separate each directory path with a space

fields.name: backup.position
fields.tip: When the dump completes do you want to rewind the tape ?

fields.name: config.attr
fields.tip: Select [% newtag %] to create a new [% key_attr %]

fields.name: credentials.acct
fields.tip: Select [% newtag %] to create a new set of credentials

fields.name: credentials.name
fields.prompt: Change the name and click save to create a copy of these credentials

fields.name: credentials.nameNew
fields.prompt: Enter the unique name for these credentials

fields.name: credentials.password
fields.prompt: Enter the password for the remote user

fields.name: credentials.port
fields.prompt: Enter the port number used for the connection

fields.name: credentials.user
fields.prompt: Enter the user name supplied to the remote host

fields.name: globals.newParam
fields.tip: Attribute names must be unique and can only contain the valid identifier characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and _

fields.name: keys_view.vals
fields.prompt: Define form keys and default values

fields.name: mail_aliases.alias_name
fields.tip: Mail alias names must be unique and can only contain the valid identifier characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and _

fields.name: mail_aliases.note
fields.text: Alias created by [% owner %][% nbsp %][% created %]

fields.name: message_view.name
fields.tip: [% element %] names must be unique and can only contain the valid identifier characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and _

fields.name: release_view.info
fields.text: The table below was read from cache which was last updated on [% lastUpdate %]

fields.name: role_manager.name
fields.tip: Role names must be unique and can only contain the valid identifier characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and _

fields.name: role_manager.role
fields.tip: Select [% newtag %] to create a new role

fields.name: role_manager.users
fields.fhelp:
Select from the All Users list to include that user in the [% ckeys.role %] role and then click add (+)

OR

Select from the Current Members list to exclude that user from the [% ckeys.role %] role and then click remove (-)

fields.name: room_manager.keywords
fields.prompt: Enter the keywords for the action
fields.tip: Used by search engines to index the page

fields.name: room_manager.level
fields.tip: Select [% newtag %] to create a new controller definition

fields.name: room_manager.name
fields.tip: Change the name and click save to create a copy of this [% noun %] definition

fields.name: room_manager.nameNew
fields.tip: Names must be unique and can only contain the valid path characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and /

fields.name: room_manager.room
fields.tip: Select ..Level.. to create and edit the controller definitions. Select [% newtag %] fill in the form and click insert to create a action definition

fields.name: room_manager.tip
fields.tip: Used by search engines when the page is indexed

fields.name: user_manager.afill
fields.text: After you have entered the user's full name you can press the AutoFill button to fill in some of the fields on this form with the correct default values

fields.name: user_manager.home_phone
fields.prompt: Home telephone number with STD code

fields.name: user_manager.profile
fields.prompt: Select the profile to use when creating this account

fields.name: user_manager.shell
fields.prompt: Select the shell to use for interactive sessions

fields.name: user_manager.user
fields.tip: Select [% newtag %] to create a new account

fields.name: user_manager.username
fields.prompt: Enter the name of the new account

fields.name: user_profiles.group_name
fields.text: This profile has [% profile %] as its primary group

fields.name: user_profiles.homedir
fields.prompt: Path to the parent of the home directory

fields.name: user_profiles.profile
fields.prompt: Select the user profile to change
fields.tip: Select [% newtag %] to create a new profile

fields.name: user_profiles.roles
fields.prompt: Space separated list of additional roles

fields.name: user_report.keynote
fields.text: Status field key: C = Current, D = Disabled, E = Expired, L = Left, N = No Login, U = Unused

fields.name: user_security.groups
fields.fhelp:
Select from the All Groups list to inlcude [% fullname %] in that group and then click add (+).

OR

Select from the Current groups list to exclude [% fullname %] from that group and then click remove (-).

fields.name: user_security.user
fields.prompt: Select the user account to change

messages.text: Alias [_1] deleted

messages.name: backup.dumpedBefore
messages.text:
The file system mounted on [_1] was last dumped on [_2] at level [_3].
The next dump will be at level [_4]

messages.name: backup.neverDumped
messages.text: The file system mounted on [_1] has never been dumped. The next dump will be at level [_2]

messages.name: backup.select
messages.text: Perform manual tape backups on on this server

messages.name: backup.status
messages.text: Current status of selected tape drive

messages.name: backup.tapeBOT
messages.text: The tape drive is online. The drive is positioned at the beginning of the tape

messages.name: backup.tapeBusy
messages.text: The tape drive is online. The drive is busy

messages.name: backup.tapeEOF
messages.text: The tape drive is online. The drive is positioned at the end of file # [_1]

messages.name: backup.tapeInProgress
messages.text: There is a backup in progress on the tape drive now

messages.name: backup.tapeNotOnline
messages.text: The tape drive is NOT online.

messages.name: backup.tapeUnknown
messages.text: The tape drive is online. The drive is in an unknown position

vals.name: para0
vals.text: This is the command and control centre for this web application. From this level you can edit all of the XML configuration files in the control directory; manager users, groups and the ACLs for each level and room; perform tape backups; view logfiles and status screens

rooms.name: access_control
rooms.tip: Control access to actions on a per user/group basis

rooms.name: backup
rooms.tip: Start a backup to tape of the selected file sets in the background

rooms.name: backup_logfile
rooms.tip: View the log file generated by the backup program

rooms.name: buttons_view
rooms.tip: Edit application button texts

rooms.name: configuration
rooms.tip: Edit the application configuration data

rooms.name: credentials
rooms.tip: Maintain database and remote connection information

rooms.name: fields_view
rooms.tip: Edit application field definitions

rooms.name: globals
rooms.tip: Change the global configuration settings for this installation

rooms.name: keys_view
rooms.tip: Edit form key definitions

rooms.name: lock_table
rooms.tip: List the contents of the lock table

rooms.name: mail_aliases
rooms.tip: Create and edit mail aliases

rooms.name: messages_view
rooms.tip: Edit application message texts

rooms.name: pages_view
rooms.tip: Edit the definitions for simple pages

rooms.name: proc_table
rooms.tip: Use this screen to view and signal processes

rooms.tip: View and generate reports on the user base

rooms.tip: Reset passwords and maintain secondary group list

rooms.tip: List user sessions on this server

rooms.tip: Manage user accounts, profiles and security

rooms.name: view_security_log
